InfectedStat: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output can vary significantly based on infection rates, unbounded.
DeadStat: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on cumulative deaths, unbounded in negative direction.
CriticalStat: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on cumulative critical cases, can also vary widely.
RecoveredStat: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on cumulative recoveries, can be any value.
InfectionAboveThresholdReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on the difference in enforcement actions, can vary widely.
Stage: Range: {0, 1, 2, 3, 4}',  # Discrete output based on current pandemic response stage.
